duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform activities and processes to place customer freight on a train and ensure availability for pick up at the destination terminal.
Inspect, secure, lift, and position trailers, containers, and intermodal flatcars.
Operate utility tractors, lift machines, and other equipment for yard and lift operations.
Utilize Microsoft Office systems, computer systems, and apply knowledge of hazmat requirements for clerical duties.
Adhere to FRA and AAR securement regulations, contribute to a team-focused on customer service, and identify and address defective components.
Perform miscellaneous activities and responsibilities as assigned by manager.
